key.inventorysorter.config.middleclick: Middle click slot to sort inventory
key.inventorysorter.config.doubleclick: Double click slot to sort inventory
key.inventorysorter.config.seperatebtn: Always display button for player inv
key.inventorysorter.config.debugtooltip:
The tooltip when hovering over a sort button 
will list instruction to blacklist that inv
key.inventorysorter.config.hidetooltip:
Neither the opened inventory, nor your player inventory 
will be sortable when this inventory is opened
key.inventorysorter.config.nosorttooltip:
The opened inventory's sort button will not be visible, 
only the player's when this inventory is opened
key.inventorysorter.sorting.invalid: Not looking at a valid inventory
key.inventorysorter.cmd.middleClickSort: Set Middle click slot to sort to
key.inventorysorter.cmd.doubleClickSort: Set Double click slot to sort to
key.inventorysorter.sorttype.name: Name
key.inventorysorter.sortbtn.dnsadd: to automatically add to the Do Not Sort Inv list
key.inventorysorter.sortbtn.dndadd: to automatically add to the Hide Sort Buttons list
key.inventorysorter.sortbtn.error: Un-blacklistable screen, or screen is already blacklisted
